name: Olive Duty [WIP]
description:
A Subsidized Future

January 13, Year of Paizano Foods Home Pasta & Salad Starter Kit

With the election of Antonia “Poor Tony” Barona in Y.H.C.S (Year of the Honda Civic Sport), The Organization of North American Nations is officially refigured as S.C.A.B. (Sovereign Confranchise of American Brands). The fifty states are now governed under a franchise model, in which individual state owners are given the rights to the American nationality and branding, left free to govern their territory with relative autonomy.

Today, in countless franchised territories across the former American Midwest, contractors under two colossal food franchises (Paizano Foods & Barona Italia)  battle for starvation wages. Their sworn mission? To take control of strategic chain locations and expand the influence of their parent companies. Armed with surplus pasta ammunition and hungry for glory, they stand ready to answer .... the Olive Duty.

Gameplay

Olive Duty is a multiplayer first-person shooter. Arm yourself with a variety of food-based firearms! Kick down doors! Eat delicious health cubes! Succumb to pools of toxic wine! The possibilities truly are endless.

Note: This game is in development and gameplay is subject to change.
